title: No LP awarded for last game?
body: I was playing a game and it ended up saying that i had won 1/10 of my placements... When ranked q came back up it went back to normal point system, I haven't been awarded points for the last game? anyone else have this problem?

replies.body: yeah I thought the new season started, I thought I just won my first game, but instead I just got +25 LP.
Same... I get that it was a mistake and all the people who lost their games were crying, but what about the people who won? we didnt even get any LP for the game..
